title: Function Challenge: Calculating Student Grades
description: Create a function called 'calculate_grade' that takes in a student's score as an argument and returns their corresponding grade. The grade scale is as follows: A (90-100), B (80-89), C (70-79), D (60-69), F (below 60). The function should also handle cases where the input score is not within the valid range of 0 to 100.
